title: Creates a new crime for sale of a firefighter uniform
summary: Creates a new crime for sale of a firefighter uniform.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2699

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. RABBITT -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Codes

       AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to creating a new  crime  for
         sale of a firefighter uniform

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The penal law is amended by adding a new section 190.28  to
    2  read as follows:
    3  S 190.28 CRIMINAL SALE OF A FIREFIGHTER UNIFORM.
    4    A  PERSON  IS GUILTY OF CRIMINAL SALE OF A FIREFIGHTER UNIFORM WHEN HE
    5  OR SHE SELLS OR OFFERS FOR SALE THE UNIFORM OF ANY  FIREFIGHTER  TO  ANY
    6  PERSON,  UNLESS PRESENTED WITH A VALID PHOTO IDENTIFICATION CARD SHOWING
    7  THE PURCHASER TO BE A MEMBER OF THE FIRE DEPARTMENT WHICH HAS AUTHORIZED
    8  THE REQUESTED UNIFORM OR AN AUTHORIZATION TO PURCHASE SPECIFIED UNIFORMS
    9  SIGNED BY THE FIRE CHIEF OR THE FIRE COMMISSIONER OF SUCH  FIRE  DEPART-
   10  MENT  ACCOMPANIED  BY  A  PERSONAL PHOTO IDENTIFICATION. FOR PURPOSES OF
   11  THIS SECTION, "UNIFORM" SHALL INCLUDE ALL OR ANY  PART  OF  THE  UNIFORM
   12  WHICH  IDENTIFIES  THE  WEARER AS A MEMBER OF A FIRE DEPARTMENT, SUCH AS
   13  THE UNIFORM, SHIELD, BADGE, NUMBERS OR OTHER  IDENTIFYING  INSIGNIAS  OR
   14  EMBLEMS.
   15    CRIMINAL SALE OF A FIREFIGHTER UNIFORM IS A CLASS A MISDEMEANOR.
   16    S  2.  This  act shall take effect on the ninetieth day after it shall
   17  have become a law.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03884-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to creating a new crime for sale of a firefighter uniform
